Verses: 1 dhevane, En Jebaththaik Kettarulum; En Vinnappaththirku Maraindhiraadheyum.
2 enakkuch Sevikoduththu, Uththaravu Arulichseyyum; Saththuruvinudaiya Kookkuralinimiththamum, Dhunmaarkkar Seyyum Idukkaththinimiththamum En Dhiyaanaththil Muraiyidugiren.
3 avargal Enmel Pazhisaatti, Kurodhankondu, Ennaip Pagaikkiraargal.
4 en Irudhayam Enakkul Viyaagulappadugiradhu; Maranaththigil Enmel Vizhundhadhu.
5 bayamum Nadukkamum Ennaip Pidiththadhu; Arukkalippu Ennai Mooditru.
6 appozhudhu Naan: Aa, Enakkup Puraavaippol Siragukal Irundhaal, Naan Parandhupoi Ilaippaaruven.
7 naan Dhooraththil Alaindhu Thirindhu Vanaandharaththil Thangiyiruppen. (selaa.)
8 perungaatrukkum Pusalukkum Thappath Theeviriththukkolluven Endren.
9 aandavare, Avargalai Azhiththu, Avargal Baashaiyaip Pirindhupogappannum; Kodumaiyaiyum Sandaiyaiyum Nagaraththile Kanden;
10 avaigal Iravum Pagalum Adhin Madhilgalmel Sutriththirigiradhu; Akkiramamum Vaadhaiyum Adhin Naduvil Irukkiradhu;
11 kedupaadugal Adhin Naduvil Irukkiradhu; Kodumaiyum Kabatum Adhin Veedhiyai Vittu Vilagippogiradhillai.
12 ennai Nindhiththavan Saththuru Alla, Appadiyirundhaal Sagippen; Enakku Virodhamaaip Perumaipaaraattinavan En Pagaignan Alla, Appadiyirundhaal Avanukku Maraindhiruppen.
13 enakkuch Samamaana Manushanum, En Vazhikaattiyum, En Thozhanumaagiya Neeye Avan.
14 naam Orumiththu, Inbamaana Aalosanaipanni, Koottaththode Dhevaalayaththukkup Ponom.
15 maranam Avargalaith Thodarndhu Pidippadhaaga; Avargal Uyirode Paadhaalaththil Iranguvaargalaaga; Avargal Vaasasthalangalilum Avargal Ullaththilum Pollaangu Irukkiradhu.
16 naano Dhevanai Nokkik Kooppiduven; Karththar Ennai Ratchippaar.
17 andhisandhi Maththiyaana Velaigalilum Naan Dhiyaanampanni Muraiyiduven; Avar En Saththaththaik Ketpaar.
18 thiralaana Koottamaaik Koodi Ennodu Edhirththaargal; Avaro Enakku Neritta Porai Neekki, En Aaththumaavaich Samaadhaanaththudan Meettuvittaar.
19 aadhimudhalaai Veetrirukkira Dhevan Kettu, Avargalukkup Badhilalippaar; Avargalukku Maarudhalgal Neridaadhadhinaal, Avargal Dhevanukkup Bayappadaamarpogiraargal. (selaa.)
20 avan Thannode Samaadhaanamaayirundhavargalukku Virodhamaai Than Kaiyai Neetti, Than Udanbadikkaiyai Meeri Nadandhaan.
21 avan Vaayin Sorkal Venneyaippola Medhuvaanavaigal, Avan Irudhayamo Yuththam; Avan Vaarththaigal Enneyilum Mirudhuvaanavaigal, Aanaalum Avaigal Uruvina Pattayangal.
22 karththarmel Un Baaraththai Vaiththuvitu, Avar Unnai Aadharippaar; Needhimaanai Orupodhum Thallaadavottaar.

23 dhevane, Neer Avargalai Azhivin Kuzhiyil Irangappannuveer; Raththappiriyarum Soodhulla Manusharum Thangal Aayulin Naatkalil Paadhivaraiyilaagilum Pizhaiththirukkamaattaargal; Naano Ummai Nambiyirukkiren.
